Package se.jguru.nazgul.core.persistence.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JpaQueryOperations
    Specification for commonly used JPA Query-related operations.
    PersistenceOperations
    Specification for commonly used Persistence operations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JpaPersistenceOperations
    Generic JPA implementation of the PersistenceOperations interface, delegating all operations to a wrapped EntityManager.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PersistenceOperationException
    Exception indicating problems with a persistence operation, as used through the PersistenceOperations interface.
